entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Louisbourg 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: ESE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this morning and early this afternoon. Rain or freezing rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
